sourcesContent:
// src/components/payslip/PayslipCard.js import React from 'react'; /** * A component to display a single payslip in a card format. * @param {object} props - Component props. * @param {object} props.payslip - The payslip data object. */ const PayslipCard = ({ payslip }) => { return (

Payslip for {payslip.employee_name}

Period: {payslip.payroll_run.period_start_date} to {payslip.payroll_run.period_end_date}

Earnings

Gross Salary: KES {payslip.gross_salary}

Overtime Pay: KES {payslip.overtime_pay}

Total Gross Income: KES {payslip.total_gross_income}

Deductions

PAYE Tax: KES {payslip.paye_tax}

NSSF: KES {payslip.nssf_deduction}

SHIF: KES {payslip.shif_deduction}

AHL: KES {payslip.ahl_deduction}

HELB: KES {payslip.helb_deduction}

Total Deductions: KES {payslip.total_deductions}

Net Pay: KES {payslip.net_pay}

); }; export default PayslipCard;
